action_label: Click here for a quick preview of CRM module
description:
# CRM to drive Customer Satisfaction

CRM modules allow you to not only build sales cadence but fuel the growth of your organization.

It helps you automate the tracking of prospects as well as existing customer’s requirements. Sales Person can further validate leads, plan next action and maintain a log of each action taken to onboard a prospect. You can capture the customer sales lifecycle of a prospect through CRM features like Lead, Opportunity, and Quotation.
name: Introduction to CRM
title: Introduction
